item.title: Free-electron Laser Optimization with Reinforcement Learning
item.description: N. Bruchon1, G. Gaio2, G. Fenu1, M. Lonza2, F. A. Pellegrino1, E. Salvato1 1University of Trieste, 2Elettra Sincrotrone Trieste 17th International Conference on Accelerator and Large Experimental Physics Control Systems Abstract # Reinforcement Learning (RL) is one of the most promis-ing techniques in Machine Learning because of its modestcomputational requirements with respect to other algorithms.RL uses an agent that takes actions within its environmentto maximize a reward related to the goal it is designed toachieve.
